text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
......What should i do.

Oh, Hiori.
You're early... or was I late...?

Good morning, Producer.
You're not late.
I just came early, that's all...
I see...!
Were you texting or something? I saw you looking at your phone.

Ah...
No, it wasn't really a text...

...? Is that so?
It's okay to prioritize that, it's not time yet.
No, it's fine.

Really...? If it was something important...
You looked pretty serious.
Um...
It's important, but...
What should I say...

First of all, but, uh,
Is it okay if I hear about it?
It's not that Producer isn't okay with it or anything...

Since it's about my own mistake,
it's not something I should talk to someone about...
A mistake...?

Huh, isn't that quite a big deal?
If it's okay with me, I'll support you.
Producer...
Wouldn't you be disappointed?

Even if I want to help,
it's not like I'd be disappointed.
You really wouldn't be disappointed...?

It's okay.
I'm absolutely on your side, Hiori.

Well...
I said something harsh to Mano and Meguru.

I see...
What did you say?
They might not be as upset as you think.

Huh...?
You seem too optimistic...

Well, you know, unless you ask, you won't know,
right?

...I told them,
"You absolutely have to have meat".
...Huh?

The lunch preferences for our next job were taken, right?
Meat or fish...

Oh! You mean that!
So, you said "It has to be meat"...?

Since making meat dishes is more complicated
and time-consuming, I recommended meat.

I can make fish dishes myself,
so I thought they could come over?

(... Hiori, that's not a big deal at all.
She probably hasn't told them what she told me.)
Hiori...
